The video of the Autobot council meeting came to a close. The three
members of the table turned to face each other, as Reflector transformed
into his three parts, and Ratbat landed on his shoulder. They waited,
and watched. "Perhaps it is time to contact Motormaster. With the six
Decepticons we sent, they will not be able to stop these Autobots." a
gruff voice said. "Agreed, but we must also not allow the Decepticons to
gain any power, at our expense." another concurs. "Yes, let us see if he
is doing our bidding on planet earth, by eliminating the other
unpleasant problems" the third said. He turned to Reflector and Ratbat.
"You two, are free to go. We however will need another unit, who was not
willing to bend to our ideology, unlike you two. Go get subject 234" he
said with a drastic sounding tone. Reflector's parts all walked off down
the hall, while Ratbat flew over and perched on one of the council
members shoulders. Content with their current actions, the Council lets
out a dark, evil chuckle, which fills the hallways, at the Autobots
expense.
